EmailTemplate.name: ATS transfer to Website Support
EmailTemplate.subject: ATS Case transfer to Website Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your email requesting website support. To ensure your issue is resolved as quickly as possible, we forwarded your information to our website experts at websupport@honeywell.com. An expert from that team will contact you very soon to resolve your question.
During the short wait, did you know you can access immediate support resources by accessing the Honeywell MyAerospace portal at www.aerospace.honeywell.com? Here you can also find technical videos, solutions to common questions and even information about your parts and repair orders.
For future websupport questions, feel free to contact the team at websupport@honeywell.com. For other technical support requests, visit www.aerospace.honeywell.com.
